name: FRETtranslator
short_description: FRETtranslator is a frame work that allows you to predict a sequence of RNA seondary structure transitions for a given smFRET trajectory. At its core it uses Viterbi-decoding. FRETtranslator combines smFRET data with RNA secondary structure predictions and RNA 3D structure sampling. As such it relies on input from additional software for RNA secondary structure and 3D structure predictions.
summary: Translate smFRET trajectories into RNA secondary strucutures
